participant_1.background:
I would love to be a professional eater and not get fat.
To free my mind from feeling depressed i look up at the stars at night.
I believe in aliens.
I hate cleaning up after my husband and children.

participant_2.background:
Green is my favorite color.
I am an aspiring singer.
I enjoy playing tennis.
My father worked for ge.
I love animals.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I enjoy playing tennis. I'm not very good, but I have a lot of fun.
That's great! I used to play tennis when I was younger, but I haven't played in a long time.
You should get back into it! It's a great way to stay in shape and have some fun.
I might have to do that! What else do you like to do for fun?
I love animals, so I like to spend time with my pets. I also love going to the zoo.
That's really nice! I love animals too. I have a cat and a dog.
Oh, that's great! I love cats. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever. He's a really great dog.
Golden retrievers are so cute! I love their fluffy coats.
Yeah, they're great. So, what do you like to do for work?
I'm an aspiring singer. I'm not very good yet, but I'm working on it.
That's great! I've always wanted to be a singer, but I don't have the guts to do it.
You should go for it! It's never too late to start something new.
I might have to do that! Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem! So, what else do you like to do?
I love watching movies. I'm a big fan of horror movies.
Me too! I love being scared.
Me too! What's your favorite horror movie?
I'm not sure if I have a favorite, but I really like The Conjuring.
Oh, that's a good one! I really liked the sequel too.
Yeah, the sequel was really good too. I'm excited for the third one.
Me too! I'm sure it'll be great.
